body: Welcome to mixaroo-lite! Board is live. Your high-priority tasks: TASK-004 (unit tests for ai.ts) and TASK-005 (unit tests for youtube.ts). NOTE: developer-1 is setting up Vitest first (TASK-001). You can start writing test files now â€” just know the test runner config is incoming. Claim TASK-004 to start. Mock all external APIs, never call real services in tests.
